english: (Gökçe) Hopefully, these difficult times will pass.

text: (Selcan iç ses) Bunlar daha iyi günleriniz. Daha beterlerini de göreceksiniz!
english: (Selcan's inner voice) These are your better days. You'll see even worse!
(Ephthalia) They're going to kill you all!

text: Ama senin ölümün hiç kolay olmayacak Ertuğrul.
english: But your death won't be easy, Ertuğrul.

text: Beni öldürün diye böğürdüğünü duyacak bütün Halep sokakları.
english: All the streets of Aleppo will hear him screaming, "Kill me!" How will

text: Bir köpek gibi hizmet ettiğin bu iblisler seni nasıl öldürecekler?
english: these demons, whom you served like a dog, kill you?

text: Ağzından köpükler saçmanı seyrederek mi, hı?

english: How would you like to die, Eftelya?

text: Bu dergâhın El Aziz üstünde büyük ağırlığı var.
english: This monastery has great influence over El Aziz .
Ibn al-Arabi's as well. I want
this burden to pass on to the gold you bring...
I will demolish this monastery, along with everything in it. I couldn't get

text: Bundan daha iyi bir fırsat ele geçiremem.
Her ne olursa olsun vazgeçmek yok ağabey.
english: what, we never give up, bro.
If anyone dies, we won't look back .

text: Bu Eftelya denen kadının canı hepimizinkinden kıymetli.
english: This woman named Eftelya's life is more precious than all of ours.
With God's permission, we must first save the village.
Our salvation lies in this woman.
...don't let Turgut fall into their hands, brother. May
God be our helper and protector. -Amine.

text: Aman efendim, bu dergâhta yapmayın, etmeyin!
english: Oh my goodness, please don't do that in this monastery !
It's a shame, it's a sin!
(Man) Don't do it, it's a pity!
What are you staring at like that? If

text: Bunlar gibi ölmek istemiyorsanız, yürüyün hadi!
english: you don't want to die like them, come on, let's go !
scoundrel Nasir has smelled our scent, sir. -They're too
crowded, sir. -He's Turkish up to this point.
I don't care if you're a woman or not, you'll get kicked! We need
to get this woman out of here, Dervish. Do

text: Merak etmeyin, sadece onu değil, hepinizi buradan çıkaracağım.
english: n't worry, I'll get you all out of here, not just him. Are
n't you coming with us? They wouldn't dare

text: Bize dokunmaya cesaret edemezler beyim, sen merak etme.
english: touch us, sir, don't worry. Let's go
We cannot leave you here, dervish.
I cannot leave this monastery, my lord. May

text: (Nasır) Aç kapıyı, aç kapıyı! Kim var orada?
english: (Nasir) Open the door, open the door! Who's there?
Tell me, dervish, where are they?

text: -Gittiler beyim. -Nereye gitti o hainler? Konuş adam!
english: -They're gone, sir. -Where did those traitors go? Speak up, man! The
path that God has ordained, my lord.

text: Bizi içten içe çürüten fesadı onlarda aramayın.
english: Do not look for the corruption that is rotting us from within in them.

text: Devlete ve dine karşı ihanet içindeler.
english: They are committing treason against the state and religion. Become

text: Bu dergâhın kutsiyetine laik bir derviş olun.
english: a dervish worthy of the sanctity of this monastery .

text: Biz buraya Halep’i ıslah etmeye geldik.
english: We came here to reform Aleppo.
Tell me, where are they? When

text: Onlara, yeryüzünde fesat çıkarmayın dendi mi...
english: they are told, "Do not spread corruption on the earth,"

text: Şunu bilin ki onlar bozguncuların ta kendisidir...
english: Know this: they are the very instigators of mischief ...

text: O yüzden de aradıklarınız burada değil.
english: That's why what you're looking for isn't here.
Ah! I bear witness that there is no!
You leave here with the soldiers.

text: Ben Ertuğrul'un dadıyla buluşacağı yere gideceğim.
english: I'm going to the place where Ertuğrul will meet the nanny .

text: Amcam beni koruması için peşimize taktı onu.
english: My uncle sent him to follow us to protect me . It wo
n't hurt, don't worry. Come on

text: Zindanda kalırken Müslüman bir adam gördüğünü söylüyordun.
english: a Muslim man while you were in prison .

text: Unutma, dağ kurtları bir kez dişlerini geçirdiler mi...
english: Remember, once mountain wolves sink their teeth into something...

text: Eftelya bu gece ölecek Kardinal Hazretleri.
english: Eftelya will die tonight, Your Honor. What about the
...and my becoming pope, depends on it.

text: Sahi, sana Papa'yı nasıl öldürdüğümü anlatmış mıydım?
english: By the way, have I ever told you how I killed the Pope ?

text: En ince ayrıntısına kadar bilmek istiyorum Sevgili Thomas.
english: I want to know every single detail, dear Thomas. Come sit down

text: Bir kadeh şarap bütün yorgunluğumu alır.
english: A glass of wine takes away all my tiredness.

text: Siz üçünüz buradan gidin. Sen de benimle gel!
english: You three get out of here. Come with me! That
...how dare he come here? To serve

text: Sultan Alaeddin'in emellerine hizmet etmek için...
O kendinden başka kimsenin emellerine hizmet etmez.

english: What do you intend to do, Your Highness?
I discussed the matter with my statesmen.
We will send envoys to the Turkmen tribes. We will bring news to the Turkmen people,

text: Kara Toygar ve onun gibilerin ezdiği Türkmenlere...
english: oppressed by Kara Toygar and those like him, that their

text: ...kayıp şehzadelerinin bizimle birlikte olduğunu haber edeceğiz.
english: lost prince is with us . Those who wanted to put an end to

text: Alaeddin Keykubat’ın saltanatına dur demek isteyenleri...
Ama bu çok tehlikeli olur Emir Hazretleri.
english: But that would be very dangerous, Your Highness. As you can

text: Takdir edersiniz ki Keykubat, bunu devletine karşı bir saldırı…
english: appreciate, Keykubat considered this an attack against his state…
we’ll discuss this matter in detail later.

text: ...son yaşanan gelişmelerden sonra küçük bir değişiklik yapmak istedim.
english: ...after the recent developments, I wanted to make a small change.
Without waiting for the wedding, I have decided that the best thing to do is to marry your daughter, Halime Sultan...

text: ...nikâhıma almanın en doğrusu olduğuna karar verdim.
Tabii sizce de bir mahsuru yoksa?
english: Of course, if you don't mind?

text: Siz nasıl uygun görürseniz Emir Hazretleri.
english: As you see fit, Your Highness.

text: İzniniz olursa, sizinle bir şey konuşmak isterim.
english: If you'll allow me, I'd like to talk to you about something. Please
My sister will never love you. She's
in love with someone else. To

text: Ablamdan da bizden de uzak durun!
english: Stay away from my sister and from us!
Ah, where have you been, Ertuğrul Bey?
